title: President Obama Signs Emergency Declaration for South Carolina (FEMA - Federal Emergency Management Agency)
text: ( Source : FEMA - Federal Emergency Management Agency ) WASHINGTON, D.C. -- The U.S. Department of Homeland Security 's Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA) announced that federal emergency aid has been made available to the State of
